data.text: @TheView @Lesdoggg Yes, I agree with that statement.People need to laugh it is just too much hatred and anger in this world.
@calibrat1963 @TheView @Lesdoggg What about Colbert. Kimmel, The View?? NONE of it is comedy. They just use the term to cover up their own hate

@RKBs_Twitstery @lisa51789715 @TheView @Lesdoggg @therealroseanne But yet every night time comedian can spew WAY worse than her one tweet & keep their jobs with never an apology? It’s hypocritical. And they MEAN what they say... covering it up by calling it comedy hence lower ratings because NONE of it is funny anymore . It’s not comedy

@YbrittonBritton @TheView @Lesdoggg I’m not only referring to Roseanne.. but she IS a comedian who has said less than 3/4 of so called comedians who are spewing filth that they TRULY believe & then saying its comedy! Double standards depending on where you are I’m guessing!
@annamarier @TheView @Lesdoggg Who gives a flying fig about Roseann, thie thread isn’t about her, this is a new day. Move on
@TheView @Lesdoggg Thank you Leslie!!!!

@RKBs_Twitstery @annamarier @TheView @Lesdoggg @therealroseanne Oh gosh really !! Who cares though really !! Even the woman who she said it about is over it ! And no one else is !   These woman have derogatory things about many people . Didn’t they just have the horrible Kathy griffin on ?
@Christine_Marze @TheView @Lesdoggg @WhoopiGoldberg Woopie is suppose to be a comedian and she is NEVER FUNNY

@lisa51789715 @annamarier @TheView @Lesdoggg All @therealroseanne had to do to enjoy her serendipitous second career, rake in $$ millions for herself, her TV network and her co-stars and provide jobs for hundreds of people was to NOT tweet a vile racist slur. She couldn't do that.
@Kelleyg0123 @TheView @Lesdoggg Great idea ! Get rid of the joyless Joy she sucks the life out of everything and she should take woopie doo with her !

@annamarier @TheView @Lesdoggg Um I’m pretty sure there are many comedians that use racist slurs all the time as part their shpeal and no one says boo !! Ha that is hypocrisy ! So what if she didn’t mean it, get over it !! Holding on to things is making this country hateful !
@TheView @Lesdoggg Omg I love her so much! “Stop walking around offended! Laugh, laugh, LAUGH!” 😂
@TheView @Lesdoggg That was one of the greatest guests you’ve had!   She is so funny
@annamarier @TheView @Lesdoggg She is not truly sorry if she was she would not keep going after people and NOT go on Hannity to say sorry.
@TheView @Lesdoggg Since when does anyone else get to tell someone to get over it and not be offended over things?
@TheView @Lesdoggg Love Leslie Jones!
@TheView @Lesdoggg Joy Behar is offended 24/7.  Her hatred isn’t funny.
@TheView @Lesdoggg LAUGH LAUGH LAUGH.... PEOPLE NEED TO LAUGH MORE...!!!! Amen Amen

@TheView @Lesdoggg No, comedians don't get a free pass for saying hateful things simply because they are comedians. They don't get a free pass for saying anything that's encourages or glorifies violence.  No... no free pass.
@annamarier @TheView @Lesdoggg Ummmm being funny and being an unhinged bigot, two different scenarios.
@TheView @Lesdoggg  https://t.co/VxqmdBpVLb
@TheView @Lesdoggg What about ROSEANNE!!??? Not a SPECK of forgiveness no matter how many times she apologizes
@TheView @Lesdoggg I LOVE HER!
@TheView @Lesdoggg Amen
@TheView @Lesdoggg You are the best!
@TheView @Lesdoggg And that's why we LOVE Leslie Jones, she has made me laugh so hard from the first moment I saw her

@TheView @Lesdoggg YAAAASSSSSS!!!  extreme Social Justice Warriors are ruining the TRUE liberal platforms/beliefs. 
And I'm what people would refer to as liberal.

@TheView @Lesdoggg AMEN! Thank you! And who are these "critics" anyway? Tell them to disclose what's in their past before they imprison comedians in their's. It's always the servants of darkness digging into someone else's warehouse to get information to destroy them. Hypocrisy is present tense.
@TheView @Lesdoggg  https://t.co/LyYKr7tASq
@TheView @Lesdoggg Be funny. Get out of politics.
@TheView @Lesdoggg HALLELUJAH, that's what it's all about.  I even say stuff that makes me laugh, all by myself. Now pass the plate 😂
@TheView @Lesdoggg I'm loving your hair!!! You go girl... go to see you back and stronger.
@TheView @Lesdoggg made me think of .@alfranken
@TheView @Lesdoggg So he has already ruined this country, why should we care what he does now...  ??  and whoopie and Joy...  when are you both moving out of the great US... ??
